name: An Easy One For You Guys
author: GrinningthroughBlood

posts.author: GrinningthroughBlood
posts.content:
I have two character concepts in mind: One is a samurai focused around the katana, must be human, and good for PvP on a level 20 server.

The other is a Paladin, using either or a greatsword or a scythe, also must excel at PvP on a level 20 server.

Thanks!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey man!

This is in the wrong place. You should post requests in the Build Request section. I know you didn't mean any harm, but our moderator has vanished, so now nobody can delete this topic. Could you please repost this in the Build Request section and we'll be happy to help out.

Thanks!
